snippet.title: Amber Heard becomes a mom; baby girl Oonagh born via surrogate
snippet.description:
California sets Sept. 14 date for Newsom recall electionAmber Heard is putting a proudly feminist spin in sharing the news Thursday that she is celebrating the arrival of her baby daughter, Oonagh Page, reportedly born via surrogate. Among other things, Heard’s news allows her to briefly put aside her ongoing legal battle with ex-husband, Johnny Depp, which has made her a regular target of rabid online vitriol from the actor’s “#JusticeforJohnny Depp” fans. Heard’s news also comes several months after winning her latest legal fight in a U. K. court, which addressed the “considerable” evidence that Depp battered her on multiple occasions during their turbulent relationship and marriage. The 35-year-old “Aquaman” star tweeted that she was “excited” to share the news that she had been able to have a baby “on my own terms.” That is, without needing a “ring in order to have a crib,” she said in a series of tweets. Page Six reported that Oonagh was born on April 8 with the help of a surrogate after Heard was told she would never be able to carry her own baby. Oonagh is a traditional Irish name, while Paige honors Heard’s late mother. Heard said Oonagh’s birth marks “the beginning of the rest of my life” and explained how she decided she wanted to have a child four years ago. In addition to the reported medical issues that prevented her from carrying a baby to term, the timing may not have been on her side. Starting in 2016, she became mired in the legal fall-out of her bitter divorce from Depp. In saying she wanted to have a child on her own terms, Heard tweeted, “I now appreciate how radical it is for us as women to think about one of the most fundamental parts of our destinies in this way.”A friend told Page Six that “Amber is besotted” with Oonagh. “She always knew that she wanted to be a mom, and this is her greatest wish come true.”The source amplified Heard’s effort to encourage women to talk openly about their struggles with fertility and to pursue opportunities to overcome challenges.“The most important thing for Amber is that she’s open about Oonagh’s birth,” the Page Six source continued. “There are so many women who feel they can’t talk about their fertility and are worried and embarrassed; Amber wants them to feel supported and realize that there are a multitude of ways to have a baby even if you have fertility issues.”Heard is currently in a relationship with cinematographer Bianca Butti, whom she has been dating since January 2020, Page Six said. She had the baby on her own, however, and is Oonagh’s sole legal parent. She is next set to star in “Aquaman 2.”Johnny Depp, right, arrives at the High Court in London, Wednesday July 8, 2020. (AP Photo/Alberto Pezzali)A year ago, Heard was facing Depp in London’s High Court for a highly watched, three-week trial, which dealt with Depp’s claims that he had been libeled by a U. K. tabloid that called him a “wife beater” in a 2018 story.


All data is taken from the source: http://mercurynews.com
Article Link: https://www.mercurynews.com/2021/07/01/amber-heard-becomes-a-mom-baby-girl-oonagh-born-via-surrogate


#AmberHeard #technews #kingworldnews #newstodayupdate #newstodaycnn #newstoday #
